conversation.message_text: LG Electronics USA: Welcome to LG Electronics USA! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

LG Electronics USA: Welcome! We'll text you about qualifying new arrivals & special offers as they happen. For now, claim your code for 5% off: lg.attn.tv/a6WAX8Ko8ewd

Text back with any questions!
LG Electronics USA: Texts may be retained for customer support & other purposes. For more info, see Terms (lg.com/us/legal) and Privacy (lg.com/us/privacy)
LG Electronics USA: Hi, I'm Jordan - your go-to LG specialist. Feel free to text me any time, and save our contact so you don't miss any updates!
I need your help
LG Electronics USA: I would be more than happy to help out!

The remote that came with my TV wasn't the remote for the TV so I tried to order the magic remote for the TV but I think I ordered the wrong one. It keeps saying that it's not supported by my TV. What do I do?
Template used: "Escalation template (esc temp)"; last updated: 2025-04-01 19:42:53.703
Template used: "Customer support"; last updated: 2023-02-17 21:53:04.869
LG Electronics USA: I'm sorry to hear that! The best way to handle this is to email us directly at orders@lgsupport.com. Our team is happy to help!

send_to_cs: No ESC for this client, send everything to CS using the "Escalation template"
templates: For 10% off welcome code issues use temp 'Follow up 1', then 'Follow up 2' after confirming the item is excluded from promos
For fridge recommendations use FRR shortcut
For service-related issues/scheduled repair service appointments use SRI shortcut
For cxs looking for replacement parts/accessories from an affiliate Parts Distributor use RPA shortcut
If a cx has an inquiry for finding the serial number/model number of an item:
➜ If it's a TV, use mnt shortcut
➜ If it's another product, use mna shortcut
dos_and_don_ts: If it's a new conversation and we didn't introduce ourselves in the automated message, start your message with: "This is Jordan at LG."

conversation.message_text: DORADO: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

DORADO: Hey it's Kiara, welcome to the VIP List! 

You just unlocked an Extra 20% OFF your order with code: HER

Valentine's is about you too.

Continue shopping: 
dorado.attn.tv/a10op0KRbExj 

Valid this week only.

DORADO: Hi Dayani I personally want to thank you for shopping with us!

To show my appreciation, I'm giving you $25 OFF your next order of Custom Jewelry!

Just use code: GIVE25 at checkout or click the link below! https://dorado.attn.tv/aqAFQ9excOZ6 

This is simply my way of saying THANK YOU for becoming a part of the Dorado Family.
DORADO: Be sure to save our number and contact card so you're always first to know about the latest drops & deals ✨

DORADO: Jewelry that feels intentional > random gifts.

Your code: "HER" still works for 20% off. 

PSA: Valentine's doesn't have to be about anyone else. 

Shop for you or for the girls who always show up: dorado.attn.tv/acXnM1nwLqfh .
What is my tracking number

DORADO: Hi, thanks for reaching out. Are you referring to Order #844253? If so, your tracking number will be sent to your email once the order has shipped. At the moment, it's confirmed and currently awaiting fulfillment.
Please also note that personalized orders require 2-3 weeks for production. We'll be sending updates via email every step of the way.

send_to_cs: Send to CS for post purchase issues
